posts.postText:
Get on and play a bit!
If I'm on, I'll reward you with DIAMONDS.
If not, Pirate or Kry might be persuaded to give you some.

The server is functional for the first time in a while, and it'd be nice to see the popularity and player numbers we had a while ago.
We've also got shiny new plugins, my favorite one being /lastseen, which tells you when someone was last on.

On top of this, I'll be giving rewards for well-built structures, and there'll be regular contests.

There's a pretty large announcement due out from the admins this week as well, so stay tuned for it.
I'm excited for it.

--Tin ;)
